claim: 6 - 3 , 0 - 6 , 4 - 6 be the score of the marco island tournament match when bonnie gadusek be runner - up
the marco island tournament date on november 7 , 1983 on clay surface have score 6 - 4 , 6 - 3
knokke tournament hold on carpet (i) surface on with elise burgin as opponent be date january 23 , 1984
resp:
1. Identify the columns in the table to look for relevant data: "tournament", "surface", "opponent", and "date".
2. Loop through each row of the data in the table starting from the first one.
3. For each row, compare the value in the "tournament" column with "knokke". If they match, move to the next step. If not, continue to the next row.
4. Compare the value in the "surface" column of the current row with "carpet (i)". If they match, move to the next step. If not, continue to the next row.
5. Check if the value in the "opponent" column of the current row starts with "elise burgin". If it does, move to the next step. If not, continue to the next row.
6. Compare the date in the current row with "january 23 , 1984". If they match, output the final answer as TRUE and relevant cells as a list containing the current row index and the column names: ["tournament", "surface", "opponent", "date"]
7. If none of the rows meet the above criteria, output the final answer as FALSE with no relevant cells.
